tables.name: nillion_chain_testnet_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive overview of every action and occurrence within the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It includes detailed information about each block's transactions, enabling the analysis of the blockchain's behavior and evolution over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was mined or locked in the blockchain.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Indexing information for events within a block in the blockchain.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Types of events that occurred in the blockchain, such as transactions or governance proposals.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Detailed information about the events that occurred in the blockchain.

columns.name: source
columns.description: Information about the data source, including the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version of the schema for the table and related data structures.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: nillion_chain_testnet_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blocks Table: This table provides information about blocks mined in the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains details such as block height and timestamp, validators, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The sequential number of a block in the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the blockchain network or chain

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: Address of the validator that proposed the block

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: Hashed list of validators involved in consensus

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block data was ingested into the testnet

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: Total number of bytes in messages (transactions) within the block

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Total number of transactions within the block

tables.name: nillion_chain_testnet_message_events
tables.description: This table contains event data extracted from Cosmos blockchain transactions. It provides a detailed view of the events occurring within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Block sequence number within the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the block was created on the blockchain

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Unique identifier for a transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within a message

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event generated by a blockchain transaction or message

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Attributes associated with a blockchain event

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version number of the blockchain data schema

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: nillion_chain_testnet_transactions
tables.description: This table contains transaction information from the Cosmos ecosystem, including their status, fees, and associated block information. It provides a comprehensive view of interactions within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequential height of a blockchain block within a specific chain.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique alphanumeric identifier of the Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hashed transaction identifier on the Cosmos network.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Transaction metadata, including sender and recipient information.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: Verbose log of a transaction's execution on the blockchain.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Human-readable message accompanying a transaction, optional.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: Transaction fee paid in native cryptocurrency of the blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: Return code indicating transaction execution success or failure.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Zero-based index of a transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: Units of computational effort expended to execute a transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: Requested computational resources for a transaction's execution.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Version number of the blockchain's transaction schema.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: List of coins used to calculate transaction fees.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: Account address authorized to grant fee reimbursements.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: Account address responsible for paying transaction fees.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: Maximum allowed computational resources for a transaction's execution.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Indication of single-key signature scheme usage for the transaction.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: Serialized data representing multi-signature address details.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: Block height after which a transaction will expire.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of data ingestion into the storage system.

tables.name: nillion_chain_testnet_tx_messages
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transaction Messages: This table contains raw data from transaction messages on various Cosmos chains. It provides a detailed view of the messages exchanged between validators in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Permanent identifier for a specific block within the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when a block was proposed and broadcast to the network

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain network being represented

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Uniquely identifies a transaction within the blockchain context

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Ordinal position of a transaction within a given block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Ordinal position of a message within a given transaction

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: Type of message definition for a specific blockchain interaction

columns.name: message
columns.description: Data payload related to a specific blockchain interaction

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: Definition of the data schema used for migration and upgrade

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was received from the blockchain source
